翾字的基本解释

翾
xuān
轻柔地（飞）：“翾飞兮翠曾，展诗兮会舞。”
快速：“怒飞饥啸，翾不可当。”
古同“儇”，轻佻：“喜则轻而翾。”

翾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuān］
［《廣韻》許緣切，平仙，曉。］
“蜎2”的被通假字。
(1)飞貌。
(2)借指鸟。
(3)急速。
(4)通“儇”。轻佻。

翾字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【羽字部】　翾； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页960第09
【廣韻】許緣切【集韻】隳緣切，?音儇。【說文】小飛也。【楚辭·九歌】翾飛兮翠曾。　又【荀子·不苟篇】喜則輕而翾。【註】與儇同。急也。　【集韻】或作?。【類篇】或作?。

翾字的起名意思

：飞翔、急、翱翔、快速。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
xuān
Softly (flying): "Yi Fei and Cui Zeng, show poetry and dance."
Quickly: "Flies in anger and screams. Don't take it."
Gu Tong's "儇", frivolous: "If you are happy, you will be light and stern."
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuān］
["Guangyun" Xu Yuanqie, Pingxian, Xiao. ]
"Shoo 2" was passed falsely.
(1) Flying appearance.
(2) Borrowing refers to the bird.
(3) Hurry.
(4) Through "儇". frivolous.
Yi

[Not concentrated] [The Department of Feather Characters] 　翾; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: Page 960 No. 09
[Guang Yun] Xu Yuanqi [Ji Yun] Yuan Yuanqi,? Yin Yan. [Said the text] Xiao Fei also. [The Songs of Chu·Nine Songs] Yi Fei Xi Cui Zeng.　[Xunzi·Meticulous Chapter] If you are happy, you will be light but elusive. [Note] Same as Yan. Anxious too.　【Jiyun】or make?. 【Classes】Or for?.
